subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Bloomberg Leaving GOP
body:
WCBS-TV has learned New York City Mayor Michael Bloomberg is leaving the 
Republican party and has announced he is currently unaffiliated with a 
political party.

Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details. 

Wireless photo and video alerts from CBSNews.com, direct to your phone. Subscribe now at http://www.cbsnews.com/htdocs/wireless/index.php.
